about_the_game:
Idle Champions of the Forgotten Realms is an official Dungeons & Dragons strategy management game.

Celebrate the release of Idle Champions on Xbox & PS4 with this EPIC Founder's Pack! It's packed full of EXCLUSIVE content, rare buffs, and premium content to help you adventure deep into the Forgotten Realms!

This Founder’s Pack includes:

  • 42 Gold Chests
  • 5 guaranteed Shiny loot cards
  • 5000 Gems
  • 2 Epic Potions of Fire Breath
  • 2 Epic Potions of Clairvoyance
  • 2 Epic Potions of Giant's Strength
  • 2 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts
  • 2 Epic Bounty Contracts
  • Exclusive buff for 1 week: Increases boss gem drops by 50%
  • Exclusive Familiar (Iris the Beholder)
  • Exclusive Skin for Celeste (Undead Celeste)
